group_1.textCenter: Hey, everyone! The mushroom hotpot's ready!

group_1.textLeft: Woo hooo!

group_1.textRight: Let's eat, let's eat!

group_1.narration: I lost my memory, but I met@two Magical Girls.

group_1.textCenter: Yeah! I'll plate it up now!

group_1.narration: I heard all kinds of things from both of@them, about Magical Girls and Witches...
And when we wanted to keep talking,@they invited me to eat with them!

group_1.textLeft: We can talk over some mushroom hotpot!

group_1.textRight: Oh, Himika! We can't do that yet!

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry! I'll put some aside for you@to use in your designs!

group_1.textRight: What!? But...

group_1.textLeft: It's really, really delicious. It's gonna@taste so good...

group_1.textRight: Oh, yes! It will!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Well, all right, I guess it's fine!

group_1.narration: I did already eat some fried rice, but@there's always room for a little more!

group_1.textLeft: So, our Soul Gems couldn't find what was@causing the reaction in the end...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, all of a sudden...it was just gone.

group_1.textLeft: My hair went back to normal, too.

group_1.textRight: (But it looked so cool sticking up!)

group_1.textLeft: Still, though...I think the magic we felt@must've been related.
Kazumi's hair felt it, and so did our Soul@Gems.

group_1.textRight: But somehow Kazumi didn't know anything@about Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: Yup...
Hrmm... It's probably 'cause of the amnesia.

group_1.textRight: I want seconds!
Me too!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, okay! Just wait a minute!

group_1.textRight: Your family is huuuge!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... We're pretty much a full house.
Hey, you! No eating with your fingers!

group_1.textRight: Aw, she saw me...

group_1.textLeft: This is how it always is at mealtimes.@It's noisy every single meal!

group_1.textRight: Really?
I think it's fun that it's so crazy here!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* You might be right!
It does feel kinda like something's missing@when I eat on my own...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]Ah...

group_1.textLeft: Dinner's ready!

group_1.textRight: Right when I finished exercising!@Good timing!
How about you, ●●?
Yes, I just finished writing this chapter.
Okay, everyone! Time to dig in!
Yes, let's eat!

group_1.textLeft: When I woke up today, I decided to cook some @beef stroganoff!
I wanted to try and capture the taste from@when Mr. Tachibana made it for me...
How is it?

group_1.textRight: Mm, it's really good!
It's not too strong, but still flavorful...@The balance is great!

group_1.textLeft: Hee hee!
Time for me to try some too! Hope it's good!
What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: Hm... I just remembered something,@I think...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, what was it? What did you see?

group_1.textRight: Hmm... No, I...I don't really know...

group_1.textLeft: I see...
But, hey, don't stress yourself out!@Eat up!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I mean, people who waste food are evil...

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, what'd you just say?

group_1.textRight: Uh...people who waste food are evil.

group_1.textLeft: That...hmmm... Why is that so familiar?
Oh! It's in a novel! It's in one of Umika@Misaki's books!

group_1.textRight: Umika Misaki?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Umika Misaki is... She's, well...
She's a... *Sob* B-best-selling... *Sniff*
Novelist!!! Waaaaaaaaah!

group_1.textRight: [chara:401101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa! Wh-what's the matter? What's she@crying for?!

group_1.textLeft: She really is crying...
Oh, I know why!
